SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_mkt_task (sys_company_id, sys_brand_id, task_code, task_type, task_name, start_time, end_time, points, check_status, task_status, remark, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_date, modified_user_id, modified_user_name, modified_date, valid, task_info, task_list_img, task_detail_img ) values (#{sysCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sysBrandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{points,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifiedUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{valid,jdbcType=BIT}, #{taskInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{taskListImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{taskDetailImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

sys_company_id,

mapper.update:
update t_mkt_task
mkt_task_id = #{record.mktTaskId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sys_company_id = #{record.sysCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sys_brand_id = #{record.sysBrandId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
task_code = #{record.taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_type = #{record.taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
task_name = #{record.taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
points = #{record.points,jdbcType=INTEGER},
check_status = #{record.checkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
task_status = #{record.taskStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user_id = #{record.createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_user_name = #{record.createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_user_id = #{record.modifiedUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modified_user_name = #{record.modifiedUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modified_date = #{record.modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
valid = #{record.valid,jdbcType=BIT},
task_info = #{record.taskInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
task_list_img = #{record.taskListImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
task_detail_img = #{record.taskDetailImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update t_mkt_task set mkt_task_id = #{record.mktTaskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sys_company_id = #{record.sysCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sys_brand_id = #{record.sysBrandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, task_code = #{record.taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_type = #{record.taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_name = #{record.taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, points = #{record.points,jdbcType=INTEGER}, check_status = #{record.checkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_status = #{record.taskStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id = #{record.createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user_name = #{record.createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_user_id = #{record.modifiedUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modified_user_name = #{record.modifiedUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified_date = #{record.modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, valid = #{record.valid,jdbcType=BIT}, task_info = #{record.taskInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, task_list_img = #{record.taskListImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, task_detail_img = #{record.taskDetailImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}

update t_mkt_task set mkt_task_id = #{record.mktTaskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sys_company_id = #{record.sysCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sys_brand_id = #{record.sysBrandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, task_code = #{record.taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_type = #{record.taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_name = #{record.taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, points = #{record.points,jdbcType=INTEGER}, check_status = #{record.checkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_status = #{record.taskStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id = #{record.createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user_name = #{record.createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_user_id = #{record.modifiedUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modified_user_name = #{record.modifiedUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified_date = #{record.modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, valid = #{record.valid,jdbcType=BIT}

update t_mkt_task
sys_company_id = #{sysCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sys_brand_id = #{sysBrandId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
task_code = #{taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_type = #{taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
task_name = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
points = #{points,jdbcType=INTEGER},
check_status = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
task_status = #{taskStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_user_id = #{modifiedUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modified_user_name = #{modifiedUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modified_date = #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
valid = #{valid,jdbcType=BIT},
task_info = #{taskInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
task_list_img = #{taskListImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
task_detail_img = #{taskDetailImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where mkt_task_id = #{mktTaskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_mkt_task set sys_company_id = #{sysCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sys_brand_id = #{sysBrandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, task_code = #{taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_type = #{taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_name = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, points = #{points,jdbcType=INTEGER}, check_status = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_status = #{taskStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_user_id = #{modifiedUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modified_user_name = #{modifiedUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified_date = #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, valid = #{valid,jdbcType=BIT}, task_info = #{taskInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, task_list_img = #{taskListImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, task_detail_img = #{taskDetailImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where mkt_task_id = #{mktTaskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_mkt_task set sys_company_id = #{sysCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sys_brand_id = #{sysBrandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, task_code = #{taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_type = #{taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_name = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, points = #{points,jdbcType=INTEGER}, check_status = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_status = #{taskStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_user_id = #{modifiedUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modified_user_name = #{modifiedUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified_date = #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, valid = #{valid,jdbcType=BIT} where mkt_task_id = #{mktTaskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT tta.mkt_task_id, tta.sys_company_id, tta.sys_brand_id, tta.task_code, tta.task_type, tta.task_name, tta.start_time, tta.end_time, tta.task_info, tta.points, tta.task_list_img, tta.task_detail_img, tta.check_status, tta.task_status, tta.remark, tto.mkt_task_order_id, tto.order_source, tto.consume_amount, tto.consume_times, tti.mkt_task_id, tti.invite_num, tmc.mkt_coupon_id, tmc.coupon_definition_id, tmc.coupon_name, tmm.mkt_msg_id, tmm.msg_type, tmm.msg_code, tmm.template_msg_id, tmm.send_time, tmm.msg_content FROM t_mkt_task tta INNER JOIN t_mkt_task_order tto ON tta.mkt_task_id = tto.mkt_task_id LEFT JOIN t_mkt_task_invite tti ON tta.mkt_task_id = tti.mkt_task_id LEFT JOIN t_mkt_coupon tmc ON tti.mkt_task_id = tmc.biz_id LEFT JOIN t_mkt_message tmm ON tmc.biz_id = tmm.biz_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND tta.mkt_task_id = #{mktTaskId}

SELECT tmt.mkt_task_id, tmt.task_name, tmt.start_time, tmt.end_time, tmt.points, tmt.task_info, tmc.mkt_coupon_id, tmc.coupon_name FROM t_mkt_task tmt LEFT JOIN t_mkt_coupon tmc ON tmt.mkt_task_id = tmc.biz_id AND tmc.valid=1 WHERE tmt.valid=1
AND tmt.mkt_task_id=#{taskId}

SELECT tta.mkt_task_id, tta.sys_company_id, tta.sys_brand_id, tta.task_code, tta.task_type, tta.task_name, tta.start_time, tta.end_time, tta.task_info, tta.points, tta.task_list_img, tta.task_detail_img, tta.check_status, tta.task_status, tta.remark, tto.mkt_task_order_id, tto.order_source, tto.consume_amount, tto.consume_times, tto.is_store_limit, tto.store_limit_type, tto.store_limit_list FROM t_mkt_task tta LEFT JOIN t_mkt_task_order tto ON tta.mkt_task_id = tto.mkt_task_id AND tto.valid=1 WHERE tta.valid=1
AND tta.mkt_task_id = #{mktTaskId}

SELECT tta.mkt_task_id, tta.sys_company_id, tta.sys_brand_id, tta.task_code, tta.task_type, tta.task_name, tta.start_time, tta.end_time, tta.task_info, tta.points, tta.task_list_img, tta.task_detail_img, tta.check_status, tta.task_status, tta.remark, tmi.invite_num, tmi.is_store_limit, tmi.store_limit_type, tmi.store_limit_list FROM t_mkt_task tta LEFT JOIN t_mkt_task_invite tmi ON tta.mkt_task_id = tmi.mkt_task_id AND tmi.valid=1 WHERE tta.valid=1
AND tta.mkt_task_id = #{mktTaskId}

SELECT tta.mkt_task_id, tta.sys_company_id, tta.sys_brand_id, tta.task_code, tta.task_type, tta.task_name, tta.start_time, tta.end_time, tta.task_info, tta.points, tta.task_list_img, tta.task_detail_img, tta.check_status, tta.task_status, tta.remark, tmts.share_times, tmts.share_url_type, tmts.share_url, tmts.is_store_limit, tmts.store_limit_type, tmts.store_limit_list FROM t_mkt_task tta LEFT JOIN t_mkt_task_share tmts ON tta.mkt_task_id=tmts.mkt_task_id AND tmts.valid=1 WHERE tta.valid=1
AND tta.mkt_task_id = #{mktTaskId}

SELECT tta.mkt_task_id, tta.sys_company_id, tta.sys_brand_id, tta.task_code, tta.task_type, tta.task_name, tta.start_time, tta.end_time, tta.task_info, tta.points, tta.task_list_img, tta.task_detail_img, tta.check_status, tta.task_status, tta.remark, tmp.property_code, tmp.is_store_limit, tmp.store_limit_type, tmp.store_limit_list FROM t_mkt_task tta LEFT JOIN t_mkt_task_profile tmp ON tta.mkt_task_id=tmp.mkt_task_id AND tmp.valid=1 WHERE tta.valid=1
AND tta.mkt_task_id = #{mktTaskId}

SELECT group_concat(tmcon.store_limit_list) AS storeLimitList FROM t_mkt_task tmt
INNER JOIN t_mkt_task_profile tmcon
INNER JOIN t_mkt_task_share tmcon
INNER JOIN t_mkt_task_invite tmcon
INNER JOIN t_mkt_task_order tmcon
ON tmt.mkt_task_id =tmcon.mkt_task_id AND tmcon.valid=1 AND is_store_limit=1 AND store_limit_type=2
WHERE tmt.valid=1 AND tmt.sys_brand_id=#{sysbrandId} AND tmt.task_type=#{taskType} AND tmt.start_time <=#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND tmt.end_time >= #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND tmt.check_status <> 4 AND (tmt.task_status=1 OR tmt.task_status=2)
